quote: The one that says if I can't kill you, you'll sure as *beep* wish you were dead.
author: Jesse Pinkman

quote: Is that your fly-sabre?
author: Jesse Pinkman

quote: I'm the guy your boss brought here to show you how it's done.
author: Jesse Pinkman

quote: Alright, I've got the talking pillow now... Okay?
author: Walter White

quote: A guy opens his door and gets shot and you think that of me? No. I am the one who knocks!
author: Walter White

quote: You either run from things, or you face them, Mr. White.
author: Jesse Pinkman

quote: I have spent my whole life scared frightened of things that could happen, might happen, might not happen.
author: Walter White

quote: You know, I have never seen anybody work so hard not to get 5 million dollars.
author: Mike Ehrmantraut

quote: No more half-measures, Walter.
author: Mike Ehrmantraut

quote: I have lived under the threat of death for a year now, and because of that, I've made peace with it.
author: Walter White

quote: What good is money that doesn't spend?
author: Saul Goodman

quote: F*ck you! And your eyebrows!
author: Walter White

quote: Chick's got an ass like an onion, makes me wanna cry.
author: Hank Schrader

quote: You're the smartest guy I ever met, and you're too stupid to see he made up his mind 10 minutes ago.
author: Hank Schrader

quote: You’re early lucky, you know that? You didn’t have to wait your whole life to do something special.
author: Walter White

quote: What I came to realise is that fear, that's the worst of it. That's the real enemy. So, get up, get out in the real world and you kick that bastard as hard you can right in the teeth.
author: Walter White

quote: Sometimes it just feels better not to talk. At All. About Anything. To Anyone.
author: Walter White

quote: To all law enforcement entities, this is not an admission of guilt.
author: Walter White

quote: We tried to poison you. We tried to poison you because you are an insane, degenerate piece of filth and you deserve to die.
author: Walter White

quote: Just so you know, this isn't personal.
author: Todd

quote: Get busy living or get busy dying.
author: Stephen King

quote: I did it for me. I liked it. I was good at it. And... I was really... I was alive.
author: Walter White

quote: Do you know how much I make a year? I mean, even if I told you, you wouldn't believe it.
author: Walter White

quote: Jesse, we need to cook!
author: Walter White

quote: I did it for the chemistry.
author: Gale Boetticher

quote: No more prolonging the inevitable.
author: Walter White

quote: Fifty years I spent like that. Finding myself awake at three in the morning. But you know what? Ever since my diagnosis, I sleep just fine.
author: Walter White

quote: Cooking is art. And the shit I cook is the bomb.
author: Jesse Pinkman

quote: We're done when I say we're done.
author: Walter White

quote: I have done this long enough to know that there are two kinds of heists: Those where the guys get away with it and those that leave witnesses.
author: Mike Ehrmantraut

quote: Send him to Belize? I'll send YOU to Belize.
author: Walter White

quote: You do seem to have a little “shit creek” action going… You know, FYI, you can buy a paddle.
author: Saul Goodman

quote: Just because you shot Jesse James, don’t make you Jesse James.
author: Mike Ehrmantraut

quote: No more half-measures.
author: Mike Ehrmantraut

quote: I did it for me. I liked it. I was good at it. And I was really... I was alive.
author: Walter White

quote: I am not in danger, Skyler. I am the danger.
author: Walter White

quote: I chose a half measure when I should have gone all the way.
author: Mike Ehrmantraut

quote: You clearly don’t know who you’re talking to, so let me clue you in. I am not in danger, Skyler. I am the danger.
author: Walter White

quote: I did it for my family.
author: Walter White

quote: You don’t need a criminal lawyer. You need a criminal lawyer.
author: Jesse Pinkman

quote: Yeah, science!
author: Jesse Pinkman

quote: Say my name.
author: Walter White

quote: You know, sometimes it feels better not to talk at all, about anything, to anyone.
author: Walter White

quote: You either run from things, or you face them.
author: Jesse Pinkman

quote: Name one thing in this world that is not negotiable.
author: Walter White

quote: The moral of the story is I chose a half measure when I should have gone all the way.
author: Mike Ehrmantraut

quote: You’re the smartest guy I ever met, and you’re too stupid to see…
author: Jesse Pinkman

quote: I have nothing to lose.
author: Walter White

quote: You can never trust a drug addict.
author: Hank Schrader

quote: I did it for me. I liked it.
author: Walter White
